title: SPY 2012 OPTICAL COLLECTION
description:
SPY is doing—and creating—rad shit. For nearly two decades now, we've managed to not take ourselves too seriously. This allows us the luxury of always putting the F-U in "FUN" while hanging with our crew of ridiculously talented athletes, designers and artsy-fartisans.
That is precisely why we know you'll be as stoked on this new SPY Optical Collection as we were while designing and building it with our crew—just for you (and us).
So get out there. Live life. Ride fast. Laugh a ton. And do everything your mother told you not to do.
